Posts.Content: heartnsoul76 wrote: My lumpectomy scar seems to be getting more prominent over time. I would love to find a tattoo artist who could do something like this with it! Flowers, I think... :) http://pearlonvelvet.com/2887032-8530573 If you focus on the worst case scenario and it happens, you've lived it twice. ~Michael J. Fox Dx 5/15/2010, IDC, 2cm, Stage IIA, Grade 3, 0/1 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 6/10/2010 Lumpectomy: Right; Lymph node removal: Right, Sentinel Chemotherapy 7/6/2010 Cytoxan (cyclophosphamide), Taxotere (docetaxel) Radiation Therapy 10/21/2010 Hormonal Therapy 1/1/2011 Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Nice Way To Cover Up Scars heartnsoul76
